name: leetcode-company-finder-extension
description: Chrome extension that shows company-frequency data for LeetCode problems

scripts.build: echo 'No build process required for Chrome extension'
scripts.verify-icons: node -e "const fs=require('fs');function dims(p){const b=fs.readFileSync(p);if(b.slice(12,16).toString()!=='IHDR'){throw new Error('Not a PNG with IHDR at expected location');}const w=b.readUInt32BE(16);const h=b.readUInt32BE(20);console.log(p+': '+w+'x'+h);}['icon-16.png','icon-48.png','icon-128.png'].forEach(p=>{try{dims(p);}catch(e){console.log(p+': ERROR '+e.message);}});"

author: LeetCode Company Finder Team
